feed.title: LibraeT - references
feed.subtitle: A database of tools for researchers

entry.title: Improve your research workflow by using Zotero as your reference manager
entry.summary: The reference manager I would personally recommend to everyone is Zotero. It's free, open source, and highly customizable. In this post I'll give a basic overview on how to install and use zotero, including a PDF with a step-by-step guide, and links to add-ons you can install.
